snippet: Newt Gingrich has made a point of injecting trivial facts and history into debates, speeches and answers to questions in recent weeks.
abstract: Newt Gingrich is making a point of injecting trivial facts and history into debates, speeches and answers to questions as he campaigns for the Republican presidential nomination; he taught college history and environmental studies for eight years before entering politics.
lead_paragraph: Newt Gingrich has made a point of injecting trivial facts and history into debates, speeches and answers to questions in recent weeks.

headline.seo: Gingrich Shows What He Knows on the Campaign Trail
headline.main: Professorial Gingrich Shows What He Knows
headline.print_headline: Professorial Gingrich Shows What He Knows on the Road
